strength_details: Clear role definition focused on BPM and Appian development
Opportunity to work with IBM, an established technology company
Data engineering responsibilities with focus on data gathering and processing
concern_details: Limited growth opportunities mentioned - no career path or learning budget
Focus on legacy BPM tools rather than modern data stack
No work-life balance or benefits information provided
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with 3+ years experience in Appian and BPM tools
Candidates with enterprise experience seeking stable roles in established companies
Engineers comfortable with legacy technology stacks and business process automation
probe_details: Ask about compensation range and benefits package
Inquire about career progression opportunities within IBM Consulting
Understand the specific tech stack and tools used beyond BPM and Appian
Clarify expected work hours and any overtime requirements
leverage_details: 3+ years experience with Appian is a specific requirement - strong match
Experience with IBM BPM, Pega, or Camunda is valuable domain expertise
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers with BPM and Appian experience at an established company. Clear role definition but limited modern tech stack and no compensation or growth information disclosed. Best for candidates seeking enterprise experience rather than innovation or rapid growth.
